wordpressPost.title: 2-Step Your Way to a Great Earth Day
wordpressPost.content:
WeSpire 4 Good launch; #goEarthDay Twitter Conversation

Step One: Join WeSpire 4 Good.
Do you wish for a simple, convenient, fresh, trusted way to take solid steps for a greener environment and a happier, healthier you? Wish is granted! WeSpire announces the launch of WeSpire 4 Good, an engaging digital platform that’s free for you and your friends to use and share. Go ahead and check it out! It’s easy to access from your phone. Now you’re on your way to making the world a better place, one easy action at a time.

Step Two: Join the Party!
Every year the entire global community celebrates Earth Day on April 22. We think of this as an annual reboot for our personal and professional sustainability plans, and to encourage others to get involved: where we work, where we live, and online. In advance of Earth Day 2016, we’ve arranged a special Twitter panel with WeSpire’s leading companies on April 20 at 2pm EST. Please join us! Check out the #goEarthDay Twitter hashtag and follow us @goWeSpire and be sure to join the conversation!

Please share this invitation with the tweeters in your universe.
